attributes.action: Sort the country out in terms of crime, education, health, safety, congestion, immigration, and every other issue we all know is wrong, or hand the job over to someone who is willing to get the job done
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think enough people are fed up of seeing the country going to ruins. Everywhere you look, something is wrong. Enough is enough -- start doing something or hand the job over.

rejection.details: there are lots of petitions on this kind of theme already
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
